comments.body:
The problem is still existing in version 3.0.2 and 3.1.0.
Other observations:
In the first click ,the soft keyboard appears and disappears in a moment, but in the future clicks the soft keyboard won't disappear. 
In the first click the  text field losses its focus, but in the second click it will gain focus. Also there is another issue that ,we will able to input only one character when the text field get focused. After entering a character the focus will be lost. So we have to tap again to get the focus.
